item.description: You've probably heard of it, now do it. Approx. 23 miles,8900 feet of elevation gain. Drive up and camp on Saturday night after leaving several vehicles at Crawford Notch. Get a 5:30 am start from Appalachia parking lot. First stop, Mt. Madison and then over the Adams's and on and on. Have lunch at Mt. Washington Observatory. There will be water stops at the huts along the way. Plan on taking Monday off, you'll be tired. The weather can be unpredictable.Estimated time, 12 hours. Open to 10 fit hikers with a sense of humor. More details to follow later.
item.name: Presidential Traverse(aka the stupid hike and the death march)
